channel.title: Lifelong LearnR
channel.description: R tips about tidying, wrangling, and cleaning for future me (or anyone else) to reference

item.title: Welcome to Lifelong LearnR
item.dc:creator: Kate Ham
item.description: Welcome to my new blog, Lifelong LearnR. Here I'll be posting R tips about tidying, wrangling, and cleaning for future me (or anyone else) to reference.
